locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A great Love‚Äôs to stop for fuel n a hot shower. Very clean in and out with a very friendly staff they have fresh coffee and fast food Godfathers Pizza and Chester‚Äôs Chicken also on-site they have a truck repair shop too the parking lot is ‚Ä¶

Another love's that is waiting for everyone shower to get dirty before they clean them this bs with the love's in the southeast corp needs to address this because it happens all the time us drivers don't have time to wait

Rude staff behind the counter. Look and seem lazy and just plain out don't want work with people. Showers arent being actually cleaned they are just moving from one gusst to another and on top of that Shower was cold.. ugh ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the cheddar dog chip and drink special. Delicious and easy. Clean restroom and lots of neat gadgets to look at. Almost like a small cool store. Shower available and most times some type of eatery attached. Great place to make a pit stop.

My first time ever using a shower at a truck stop. I was pleasantly surprised. I feel like a new person! The  showers  are spotless and the employees are super friendly. Other Loves should use the location in Dyersburg as a bench mark.

Thanks to the staff for going above and beyond to ensure my wait for a shower was up by coming over to me at the Chester's seating area to tell me. I hope they get the screens up and running soon the one that tells you when your up for a ‚Ä¶
Fix your showers! They said the problem was no hot water, but they wouldn't let me have one even when I said I would take a cold shower. Why not?

Don't bother stopping here if you need a shower at night, because "we're sorry sir, none of them have been cleaned". 3rd consecutive time I've heard this excuse in 4 weeks at this store. 6 employees on duty in the store. 4 standing around ‚Ä¶

Like your stores, products, food offerings etc, however waiting two hours for a shower is ridiculous. Usually don't stay overnight at your locations, because of the issue waiting on showers and no laundry facilities in most or all of your ‚Ä¶
Worst layout of any Loves ever.  Long walk from truckers fuel island and parking lot.  Nothing like having to walk that far in the rain to get fuel receipts and take a shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ be done here is to change the manager of this Pilot Travel Center! A lot of problems, such as a queue for the showers because the staff is in no hurry to clean them, and the washing machines simply don‚Äôt work (no hot water) the water ‚Ä¶

The management in this location is absolutely no good. Apparently management doesn't do random checks because whomever is supposed to be cleaning the showers is not doing their job properly. I go in to shower 5 and there's no toilet paper. ‚Ä¶
I was 3 in line for a shower and waited 1 hour at 5:30 am. The employee was just minding his own business. 4 cubicles were not cleaned and he didn't care.
‚Ä¶ The showers are decent. There are 8 showers, and at least they are hot and an average size. The attendant for the shower is right on.  Very little wait for showers. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Did a 34 hour restart here not bad have good food and shower and laundry.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ something else shows 8,5 was free but he shut the door instead of cleaning and leave I request the management to check the video footage that why he did it as I have already waited for 1 hour for shower ? July,30,2025 from 1:40pm to 1:55pm
Clean stocked shower with good hot water. Store was nice and clean as well.
Not clean at all they give me the shower that‚Äôs not cleaned and even the towels are wet
Reserved shower true the App and when they call my number saying that my shower is ready I pressed to the shower so door was open and not ready and get charged
Good service clean shower did laundry and ate at Arby‚Äôs who gave bad reviews must of had there panties in a twist

locations.title: MYS DEERFIELD TRAVEL CENTER
locations.content: MYS DEERFIELD TRAVEL CENTER may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ over the floor/toilets. Walls in an inch thick of nasty. The showers are 8$ and are absolutely the most disgusting thing I have ever seen, as you can see from the pictures. Instead of feeling clean after a shower, you will feel like you're ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ god don‚Äôt go in the bathrooms. I swear to god they have not been cleaned in an insanely long time. Toilet paper filled toilets and plenty of poop to go around all over the floors. I need a shower after stepping foot in there what the heck.

Great parking room and it's paved. Plenty of it, even 24 shore power spots. Chicken meal was pretty good. Shower was ok, nothing fancy. Then again, I'm not some delicate little flower either. Staff was friendly. Nice price on fuel to boot. ‚Ä¶

Very nice helpfull people here. Bathroom and shower were spotless. Nice clean parking lot. 4 stars = improvements = 1. More options with coffee. Not fond of ground up bones in packets calling it creamer. 2. Does everything have to be deep ‚Ä¶

Nasty Showers don't go here and they have to let you in the shower with a master key and won't give you a shower key so you can lock your stuff in the shower room and go get what you need and come back then the shower room has no place to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The doors to the bathrooms and showers are filthy. Black and prints all over them. Men's restroom was just as clean as the doors. $8 for a shower didn't even give you a washcloth. No ventilation. Dirty hand prints all over everywhere. Floor ‚Ä¶
Not a bad place. Been to worst. Restrooms clean, shower was a little small with no toilet. Of course im comparing to Loves, Pilot & the rest of the bigger places. I'll come back, if in the area.
Showers: have no toilet or place to sit. No hooks to put your stuff. The showerhead leaks all over. Why in the world would you not have toilet in shower rooms? The staff was friendly.

‚Ä¶ The guy playing the game did the same thing. Then to top it off go to get in the shower and there are used bars of soap with a clump of hair in the bottom of the shower  and the towels were still dirty! This truck stop is a one and done! N ‚Ä¶

Showers are OK but no toilet in shower room.
Must use bathroom in the men's room before you go shower. Also the deli is mostly fried food.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We were not offered any sort of comp, which can be expected in food or shower points at other locations in similar situations. We did not ask.

‚Ä¶ because I only had a couple hours left on my 14 hour clock. I decided to take a shower, and the showers are spectacular, fantastic, fresh and very clean. The TA  truck stop here in Denmark Tennessee their showers are the cleanest I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and seems like all t a ‚Ä¶. Stoped in to get a shower had one guy running the place had to shut down showers cause he did not have any help no one to clean them so u know bathrooms were bad to ‚Ä¶. Bo bought these spots out and there not ‚Ä¶

Absolute chaos in the toilets, the shower does not work, but they take money for using it. Early in the morning no one was in line, but nevertheless all the cabins and showers are occupied. I think the worker does not want to do his job - ‚Ä¶
Mann this for the truckers DO NOT STOP HERE FOR A SHOWER super filthy showers
I stopped here to take a shower and I was appalled to see the towels that they are putting in the shower stalls for Truck drivers to use. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on the counter which are sitting on the dirt a mess. I try to book a shower kiosk is not working on the top lot of people on the counter and there is one cashier. You asked questions no answers. Fuel pump is not working causing trouble ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , pump shut down without any indication it's down, go to first pump get 136 gallons pull around and park go inside for a shower, kiosk won't pull up my info, lady behind the counter offers to get my shower set up then proceeds to tell me I ‚Ä¶

Bad customer service by porters waited 45 minutes to get a shower and had to listen to them complain about being disrespected. I haven‚Äôt ever seen these people before. And complained about not having a break the girl was on break while I ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a shower. Individual shower room included private bathroom. Price includes towels, liquid body wash, hair dryer. Very clean. Nice hot shower. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I like it a lot the folks that works inside the owners are nice people in the gas is always good and I enjoy getting knick knacks while I'm inside who won the first thing I always notice the whole place is normally very clean and I can truly say so for the experience inside have been very nice
Convenient location, gas prices seemed competitive,  bathroom was not the cleanest , older building but Not dumpy. ‚Ä¶

Very nice convenience store. Gas, food,ATM. Clean tables to sit and eat. Clean floor s. As well as restrooms. Wheel chair accessibility. Management is great. Sunny and his wife Mena are very nice people.
Bathrooms were NOT clean. Staff didn't talk, and the place smelled. Sorry but no
They have new gas pumps with screens showing sports highlights and other information. Also had flower pots with blooming flowers at the end of every pump. Clean store with okay bathroom.
Got drink, used restroom, left. Fairly clean. Nice staff
